about:
Accelerating SaaS Growth with AI-Driven Solutions

In today’s fast-paced tech environment, traditional methods won’t get you the results you need. You’ve probably spent too much time and money on developers or consultants who promised the world but left you with delays, missed opportunities, and frustration.

Here’s the truth: Success doesn’t come from chasing the latest tech trend or shiny object. It comes from leveraging proven, AI-driven strategies that ensure your product is developed, shipped, and market-ready in record time – and primed to secure investor funding.

With years of experience in artificial intelligence and product development, I’ve helped companies add over $20M in profits and secure over $10M in VC funding by delivering high-impact AI solutions.

Whether you’re a startup looking to build your MVP or an established business aiming to scale, my expertise can help you.

Let’s connect and explore how I can help you achieve your growth goals. I’d love to discuss your current challenges, your targets, and how we can get you there.

Visit my Website at https://nexgenai.solutions

about:
My wife, originally from Jamaica, and I, from Austria, both came to the U.S. with humble beginnings. Early on, we realized the critical role that customized financial strategies play in achieving financial security to reach a stage in life that allows you to focus on those things that are most important to you.

As life and business gets more complex and your aspirations higher, a second pair of eyes and the comprehensive personal guidance of a financial advisor may become invaluable.

My team and I primarily serve a selected group of successful business owners and professionals both virtually and in-person across the country.

Our core mission is to empower our clients to make clear, informed decisions that align with their personal aspirations and financial goals. For that we use an established process to put all the pieces of the puzzle together, by understanding what's important to you, building personalized strategies to help you reach your goals and partnering with you throughout your life to keep you on track.

Since 2019, my Austrian-Jamaican-U.S. family and I have lived in the beautiful city of Doral, Florida, where I engage in volunteer activities and community events, as well as speaking engagements to promote financial wellness and literacy.

My academic background includes a bachelor's degree in industrial engineering and an MBA from California Lutheran University.

about:
COMPLIANCE MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATES, LLC
Assuring Compliance | Mitigating Risk | Driving Efficiency

BSA/AML Compliance & Risk Management Consulting
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Compliance Management Associates LLC (CMA) is a BSA Risk Management & Control Consulting firm based in South Florida - designated both as a critical High-Intensity Drug Trafficking Area (HIDTA) and a High-Intensity Financial Crime Area (HIFCA). Our offering, which includes fractional Bank Secrecy Act/Anti-Money Laundering (BSA/AML) services, is targeted to assist our clients in addressing risk management issues emanating typically from passive oversight, insufficient policies, procedures and expertise, deficient risk monitoring and reporting and inadequate BSA/AML training.


Areas of Expertise
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
BSA, AML, OFAC Compliance
Risk & Control Management
Compliance Monitoring & Testing (CMT)
Issues and Remediation Planning
Enforcement Action Remediation


Who We Serve
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

We serve financial institutions, non-bank financial institutions, broker-dealers, and credit unions.


Our Team
▬▬▬▬▬

The accomplished team at CMA not only possesses seasoned expertise in banking operations but also boasts a C-suite background, showcasing extensive experience and a comprehensive understanding of regulatory affairs. We adopt a collaborative approach with the client in determining the priority of the areas to be scheduled for review in the consulting engagement based on the annual risk assessment, audit findings and regulatory exam findings.


Value Proposition
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

We are a specialty consulting advisory firm assisting our clients in the satisfaction of regulatory mandates and mitigation of financial crime risks. Execution of robust quality assurance analyses supported by the utilization of advanced technology applications provides the basis for the identification of risk mitigation strategies. Our services include engaging in the clearance of backlogs in the BSA Unit and the execution of regulatory look back requests.


If you want to

✔ Benefit from an independent review of oversight effectiveness regarding compliance risks, which entails critical and robust evaluation and testing of the internal controls system including policies and procedures to ensure you satisfy regulatory mandates.

✔ Secure expert guidance and assistance in the remediation of enforcement actions.

✔ Alleviate any concerns regarding independent testing for compliance with trade finance transactions.

publications.title: An exploratory study towards incorporating subjective criteria into the capital investment decision
publications.description: In the field of finance and management much has been written on the subject matter of capital project evaluation techniques (from a simple payback period computation to sophisticated mathematical models).  As a further progression in the field, this study embarks on incorporating the subjective elements of the decision making, given the inadequacies of the strict quantitative approach. The proposed investment model fundamentally acknowledges funds allocation as being a tangible expression of a company’s strategy and utilizes a linear programming approach towards seeking an optimal decision choice when considering both the financial and non-financial benefits associated with capital expenditures.

Lily began her professional career in International Relations serving as the Consul General’s liaison at the Israeli Consulate in Miami. While at the consulate Lily was responsible for protocol, public relations, and business development connecting the Consul General to Miami’s Jewish community. 

Lily graduated from The American University in Washington, D.C., with a B.A. degree in International Studies. Lily was an active member of Nova SouthEastern’s University School’s parents association. She has been involved with numerous organizations including the Young President’s Club of Mount Sinai Hospital, the Central Agency for Jewish Education, and has served on the local board of Women’s American ORT.

Balancing family and business demands, Lily’s high energy and strong work ethic have allowed her to consistently exceed client and candidate expectations. Lily is a native of Miami, Fl. graduating from Ransom Everglades School. She is the proud mother of two children, Aaron and Amanda. She enjoys traveling and has traveled throughout Europe, the Middle East and the United States. In her free time she enjoys a good book, working out at the gym, and going to the beach.

Lily may be contacted either by calling (305) 614-5060 or on her cellular (305) 333-8721

about:
I had a relative who was in the carpet business as a second-generation business owner, and he enjoyed much success. That influence caused me to start my business over 50 years ago and I have steadily grown my passion for it. 

An aspect of my business that is extremely satisfying is how our work and products will transform a home or commercial area to become an exceptional one, beautiful to see. The passion I have for my business has increased over time so I am now considered one of the best in the industry for service, knowledge, innovation, and customer satisfaction.    

Ajami’s Surfaces 
Our internal structure ensures that clients benefit from continuous first-class attention. Every project is guaranteed to unfold smoothly, accurately, with reliability. 

•	FOR DESIGNER/ARCHITECT CLIENTS, we use design tables to facilitate the selection and presentation process and encourage the use of their own fabrics and paint colors in order to visualize the ideal product and bring it to life using our several custom lines.

•	FOR BUILDER CLIENTS, we work with installers and help homebuyers in the selection process. We are also able to produce identical take-offs using only a pdf file and have streamlined our bidding for a quick turnaround.

•	FOR CONTRACTORS, we work with their clients in the selection process. We also make sure they have all products needed to complete the job in a timely manner.

Of particular interest, we are the only distributor in Florida for MBS (Magnetic Business Solutions). The MBS Underlayment System is the flooring-specific building solution utilizing magnetic technology from MBS. It is not only innovative but also addresses key flooring concerns. It is the future of installation.

With unique dedication and relentlessness, we guarantee our client’s expectations will not only be met, but also transcended as our mission is to continue providing the unsurpassed level of quality, we have become renowned for in South Florida since 1971.

Advantages of Ajami Surfaces

about: Savvy, innovative executive with extensive eCommerce and digital marketing experience within highly competitive markets. Strong reputation for driving eCommerce marketing and sales by increasing product visibility and successfully converting manufactured goods to online sales. Analytical professional skilled in identifying problems and recommending and building strategic and tactical changes that increase profitability by utilizing industry best standards to drive growth. Demonstrated success working for transnational FMCG/CPG giants to drive business beyond expected goals. Included in Shopper Marketing Magazine and path To Purchase Institute "Who's Who in eCommerce" 2017, 2018 and "Who's Who in Digital Shopper Marketing", 2018 top 100 lists.

experience.description: Driving eCommerce-centric partnerships with both Suppliers and Omni-Channel Retailers, identifying and developing eCommerce business in established, new and Emerging channels and on-premise. Building joint-business planning across Priority accounts, developing goals for category leadership. Identifying and pursuing opportunities available with both 1st and 3rd party players in Digital, eCommerce, Data.

Leading eCommerce retail strategy, partnerships and eCommerce Business Development for WG&S. Responsible for driving market share and volumes through eCommerce by partnering with major retailers and e-tailers such as Drizly, BottleCapps, Instacart, ABC, Total Wine & More, Walmart, Kroger, Target. Driving digital transformation by selecting and building eCommerce capabilities: Content Sharing Platform, CDP/DMP, Digital Shelf Analytics, Performance marketing tools, etc. Primary point of contact for eCommerce teams at key Alcohol Distributors. Driving and executing true 360 campaigns in Omni-Channel retail.

As seen in Shopper Marketing "Who's Who in eCommerce 2017" and "Who's Who in Digital Shopper marketing 2018": Nikolai's key responsibilities are creating and executing eCommerce strategy, driving retailer partnerships, create and implement online specific tactics and capabilities to help grow the beer category and the Heineken USA share In the online channel.

Partnering with National Sales, Brand Marketing, Commercial Marketing, Business Intelligence, Finance and Leadership teams to drive eCommerce and grow online sales. Responsible for joint business planning for eCommerce with Walmart, Kroger, Target, Amazon, Drizly, Minibar, Instacart, FreshDirect, Peapod, HEB and many others. Created the first ever online product content catalogue for seamless content updates. Optimized online portfolio performance to better fit eCommerce reality. Implemented product content sharing and syndication platform for all HUSA SKUs to major pure players and omni-channel retailers listed above. Led the implementation of product ratings and reviews generation and syndication.

KEY ACCOMPLISHMENTS:
•	Increased HUSA online market share from 2% to 4,3% in one fiscal year and outgrew offline share by 1,5%.
•	Increased visibility / availability of HUSA products on Amazon by 300%.
•	Closed offline/online product availability gap in major omni channel players

Headed the team tasked with shaping, developing and implementing K-C eCommerce channel and digital strategy for Huggies, Kotex, and Depend brands. Drove portfolio to gain fair market share within the NA, WEU and RU markets. Built and modified P&L, portfolio, digital shelf, price and assortment, and trade spend. Hired, trained, and build teams tasked with executing business plans to increase market share and success in eCommerce by maximizing product visibility to increase sales via upselling and cross-selling.  Led the innovations in corporate SEO programs merging and combining SEO and SEM (along with retargeting / display ads campaigns) in order to increase organic search results along with overall visibility of company’s Internet portfolio. Established and executed successful search optimization campaigns within the Amazon, Wal-Mart and Groupon systems. Established and launched successful E-mail marketing and subscription campaigns for Huggies, Kotex and Depend brands.  

KEY ACCOMPLISHMENTS:
•	Performed market analysis and needs assessment to create and implement a five-year strategic business plan.
•	Smashed Y2Y growth by 46% and exceeded sales targets more than 40% by introducing channel-specific SKUs and streamlining the product supply chain.
•	Drove project to create, calculate, produce, and launch Huggies SKU which lead to #2 product ranking on the Eurasian eCommerce market.

Led and directed Internet projects in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, CIS, Ukraine, Kazakhstan, Mongolia, and the Baltics, managing the HQ Online team that included six regional and 11 local market FTE positions. Project lead for major redesign and relaunch of new e-commerce-oriented website, managing P&L, staffing, planning, implementation, test, and launch.  Created and launched first ever e-commerce e-mail marketing initiatives for company and secured smashing 15% of customers repeated purchases rate. Created and curated Oriflame’s very own affiliate network which increased company’s search ranking up to 35% with Google, Yandex and Bing search engines. Created and coordinated first ever SMM-affiliate network (along with traditional affiliate network) in the history of color cosmetics online sales. Oriflame’s Social Media channels won few PR awards for the best corporate Facebook and Twitter accounts during 2013/14. Led the major initiative for combining major Facebook pages for different countries with Facebook HQ, which led to 28% of more traffic inside Facebook and gained over 7,5 Mil subscribers.

KEY ACCOMPLISHMENTS:
•	Collaborated to position company as biggest European cosmetics manufacturer selling online.
•	Led project and managed team tasked with merging eCommerce website and editorial that increased rank in search engines and site traffic to achieve a 15% conversion rate.

Oversaw all company internet activities including online video (mainly YouTube) in Russia, CIS, and Ukraine. Collaborated with media buying, creative, and digital agencies to create, supervise, and execute general internet marketing, digital marketing, and social media marketing strategies for company portfolios and corporate brand. Created and managed brand websites and landing pages; designed and launched Nurofen and Durex mobile applications. Managed the digital presence of all 16 RB's Powerbrands including but not limited to AirWick, Vanish, Finish, Veet, Clearasil, Dettol, Nurofen, Lemsip, Strepsils, Gaviscon.

KEY ACCOMPLISHMENTS:
•	Contributed to company’s ranking as 30% more efficient in online video placement and delivery than its nearest competitors by hiring a tracking agency to exclude ad fraud, which increased targeted domestic views.
•	Reduced advertising spending 30% and increased placement efficiency 30% by executing targeted planning and ad placement on 16 heavily-promoted brands; successful advertising with targeted audience led to online video.

Planned, coordinated, and executed Cyrillic internet marketing for Disney, Pixar, Miramax, and Touchstone films. Collaborated with key stakeholders to manage traffic-generating resources of Runet, internet media, new media and blogosphere, exhibitor sites, film sites, major video sharing resources, and search engines. Led and supervised anti-piracy activities including torrents, file-sharing systems, trackers, p2p networks, and local networks. Pioneered TWDC’s presence on Twitter, created and executed major initiatives to bring the company and its affiliates to YouTube.

KEY ACCOMPLISHMENTS:
•	Created and adapted studio content to fit needs of Russian internet including hidden and viral marketing and built brands by organizing online junkets and press events and interviews.
•	Organized and oversaw internet marketing campaign projects including media planning, buying, and mixing.

Peter is the founder of Horizon Growth LLC, a consulting firm that helps emerging and transitioning companies increase their value and growth. He leverages his 30+ years of C-Level experience in various industries and markets, working with private equity firms, family offices, private investors, and entrepreneurs. He is also a Chapter Success Coach at BNI Global, the world's largest business networking and referral organization.

His core competencies include operations, process improvement, new business development, restructuring, and leadership. He is well known for his work in the fitness industry, where he transformed Cybex from a regional brand to a global leader, with distribution in 70 countries and revenues exceeding $100 million. He is a Malcolm Baldrige award finalist, a two-time finalist for Manufacturer of the Year in South Florida, and a trusted leader who twice defeated organized labor. He is passionate about empowering emerging companies to achieve operational excellence and strategic alignment, and to realize their full potential.

Peter’s leadership affiliations include MIT Enterprise Forum where he was Chairperson for 2016 -17 and was previously chair in 2010, The Sporting Goods Manufacturers Association where he served on the Board of Trustees and held the position of Vice Chairman. He has been an active member of YPO/WPO (Young Presidents Organization / World Presidents Organization) since joining the New England Chapter in 1988.
His personal and professional developments include the Wharton Presidents’ Seminar at the University of Pennsylvania, Deming Quality Seminars, Motorola Management Institute, and MIT/Sloan workshops on ERP and Technology in the Corporation. A personal passion is boating, and he has held a U.S. Coast Guard Masters License, 100 Tons to operate passenger carrying vessels.

headline: Experienced leader with extensive expertise in global corporate governance, finance, transformation, turnaround management, compliance, and operations.
about:
Stan Rubin is an experienced leader with extensive expertise in global corporate governance, finance, transformation, turnaround management, compliance, and operations.

Key Attributes:
• Corporate Governance, Enterprise Risk and Internal Control
• Problem Solving, Strategic Planning, Leadership & Collaboration with Multi-Cultural Teams
• Post-Mergers Integration, Anti-Money Laundering Compliance, and Operating in a Regulated Industry

As Ocean Bank's Chief Risk Officer, Mr. Rubin oversees activities designed to mitigate risks for the organization, including executing the Enterprise Risk Management Framework, managing corporate governance, and serving as the primary liaison with regulators. He was CFO and CRO until 2024, when he transferred the CFO role to his deputy, whom he had mentored ed since hiring. During Mr. Rubin's tenure non-performing assets decreased from over 15% of total assets to less than 0.5%, liquidity as a percentage of deposits increased from 28% to 55%, a profit was recorded in 2012 after multiple years of losses and has remained profitable, and capital more than doubled without a capital injection.  Consequently, the organization’s regulators terminated a Cease & Desist Order that had been in effect since 2007. Ocean Bank is an incredible turnaround success.

Mr. Rubin successfully managed the integration of Citibank's acquisition of two large institutions in Central America across 6 countries, including integrating 3 finance teams in 5 of the countries, reducing legal entities from over 100 to 50, and establishing strong internal control processes. After a major internal control failure in Citi's Canadian cards businesses, Mr. Rubin successfully transformed all processes and reengaged a disillusioned team.  Mr. Rubin established the Citi's Latin American shared service center. Mr. Rubin guided Venezuela’s business through a volatile economic period when the central bank allowed the Bolivar to float. publications.title: On the moment system and a flexible Prandtl number
publications.publishedAt: Modern Physics Letters B, World Scientific · Feb 19, 2014
publications.description: The Maxwell–Boltzmann moment system can be seen as a particular case of a mathematically more general moment system proposed by Machado in Ref.1. These last moments, of which a suggested continuous distribution and an integral generating form are presented here for some orders, are used in this paper to theoretically show (one of) their usefulness: A flexible Prandtl number can be obtained in both the Boltzmann equation and in the lattice Boltzmann equation with a conventional single relaxation time Bhatnagar–Gross–Krook (BGK) collision model.

publications.title: On the generalized Hermite-based lattice Boltzmann construction, lattice sets, weights, moments, distribution functions and high-order models
publications.description:
The influence of the use of the generalized Hermite polynomial on the Hermite-based lattice Boltzmann (LB) construction approach, lattice sets, the thermal weights, moments and the equilibrium
distribution function (EDF) are addressed. A new moment system is proposed. The theoretical
possibility to obtain a unique high-order Hermite-based singel relaxation time LB model capable to
exactly match some first hydrodynamic moments thermally i) on-Cartesian lattice, ii) with thermal
weights in the EDF, iii) whilst the highest possible hydrodynamic moments that are exactly matched
are obtained with the shortest on-Cartesian lattice sets with some fixed real-valued temperatures,
is also analyzed.

headline: Managing Partner at The Campbell Law Group | Corporate  Law
about:
Regina is the Managing Partner of The Campbell Law Group based in Coral Gables, Florida. She is recognized for her unique insight, resourceful problem-solving skills and understanding of how legal issues affect people and companies differently.

One of Regina’s biggest passions is litigation. Regina and The Campbell Law Group PA have seen a great deal of success in prosecuting and litigating business fraud and ponzi schemes, tortious interference with a business relationship cases, non-compete cases, shareholder actions and member disputes. 

Regina, also, as a result of her experience in building various businesses from the ground up, prior to becoming a lawyer, has a strong background in complex business and financial transactions, with specific experience dealing with mergers and acquisitions (M&As), private equity funding, and strategic drafting and planning of company structures and shareholder/corporate governance documents, along with issues that arise in management and the dynamics between shareholders and/or members and owners of a company.

Regina is known for her creative solutions to complex problems, her comprehensive knowledge of the law, and her diligent work ethic. 

Regina is fluent in both English and Spanish and has assisted businesses and families from over twenty countries with their business legal needs.

Wrestling with complexity.

publications.title: Fracturability index is a Mineralogical Index,  “A new Approach for Fracturing decision”
publications.description:
SPE-172917-MS
Shale has ultra-low matrix permeability, and consequently requiring the creation of hydraulic fracturing to maximize the contact area with the reservoir. The key to successful to fracturing treatment in shale formation is the identification of the sweet spots. Productive shale consists of quartz, feldspar or carbonate and clays, in addition to organic matter (Kerogen). Thus it is challenging process to map the best zones to fracture. A new Fracturability index based on mineralogy has been developed to locate the best areas along horizontal wells to fracture. A good fracturability index would a long production plateau for shales.

publications.title: Demonstration of grid-enabled ensemble Kalman Filter data assimilation methodology for reservoir characterization
publications.description: Demonstration of grid computing capabilities in reservoir simulations using ensemble Kalman filters based history matching.

headline: Engineer, Executive, Founder, Entrepreneur
about:
At the helm of Fortress Payments for over three years, my entrepreneurial journey has pioneered decentralized biometric payment solutions. Our team's dedication to innovative security has reshaped how transactions are authenticated, prioritizing user privacy and trust in digital commerce. At Aware, Inc., my tenure as Shareholder and SVP of Enterprise Authentication solidified our reputation in digital identity, enhancing enterprise systems with robust biometric technologies.

My analytical acumen and project planning excellence have fueled strategic growth and new business development. Collaborating with a team fluent in Spanish, Italian, and English, we've transcended language barriers to establish a global footprint. The focus has always been on creating user-centric platforms that champion secure and seamless payment experiences, leveraging my deep industry knowledge and commitment to advancing the state of digital authentication.

experience.description: Fortress Payments is a cutting-edge payment acquirer with our own Wholesale BIN dedicated to revolutionizing the card-not-present (CNP) payment space. Our mission is to make ecommerce more secure, efficient, and trustworthy by leveraging our first to market  biometric payment technology to eliminate both attack and friendly fraud.
Fortress Identity offers Digital ID Verification with AML/KYC, Face and Voice Biometric Authentication, and 1-Step Biometric Payment solutions for financial, telecommunications, and healthcare.

headline: Aerospace Executive | Division President | GM | Executive MBA (MIT Sloan) | Global Leader in Supply Chain, Manufacturing & Digital Transformation | P&L Management | Driving Growth & Efficiency Across US, Mexico & Europe
about:
With over 27 years of leadership experience spanning General Management, Operations, Supply Chain, IT, and Project Management, I have built a career on driving transformation, operational excellence, and business growth in complex, global environments.

Currently serving as General Manager of a joint venture between Albany Engineered Composites and Safran Aircraft Engines, I lead a multimillion-dollar P&L across the US, Mexico, and France, managing large-scale manufacturing operations for composite parts used in LEAP engines. My focus is on enhancing efficiency, agility, and profitability while ensuring operational resilience in a fast-evolving aerospace industry.

🔹 Industry Expertise: Aerospace, Automotive, Steel Manufacturing
🔹 Leadership Strengths: General Management, Operations, Supply Chain, Digital Transformation, P&L Management
🔹 Global Mindset: Experienced in leading cross-functional, multicultural teams in dynamic and challenging environments

I am also currently pursuing an Executive MBA at MIT Sloan, complementing my hands-on leadership experience with cutting-edge enterprise strategy and innovation. This journey enhances my ability to shape the future of global operations and lead transformative growth.

Passionate about executional excellence, strategic vision, and empowering teams, I thrive on turning challenges into opportunities and driving organizations toward sustainable success in an ever-changing world.

Let’s connect to exchange insights on aerospace, operations, leadership, and global business transformation!

headline: Digital Marketing | SEM Management | PPC Advertising | Social Media Marketing | WebCare
about: Performance-driven Paid Media Manager & Digital Marketing Strategist with 15+ years of experience managing paid search, display, video, and social campaigns across Google, Bing, and Meta. Proven ability to drive scalable growth through full-funnel strategies, A/B testing, audience segmentation, and data-driven decision-making. Highly skilled in Google Ads, Meta Ads, GA4, GTM, Programmatic and landing page optimization.
topSkills: Google Analytics • Google Ads • Social Media • JavaScript

experience.description:
- Strategically managed and optimized over 45 paid search and paid social accounts across Google Ads, Microsoft Ads (Bing), and Meta, overseeing a monthly budget exceeding $450,000 to drive lead generation and revenue growth.
- Achieved a 21% average lift in ROAS by executing advanced bid strategies, refining audience segmentation, and leveraging intent-based keyword targeting across brand and non-brand campaigns.
- Designed and launched comprehensive full-funnel PPC initiatives, integrating Performance Max, Remarketing, and Search campaigns to align with customer journeys and maximize conversion efficiency across touchpoints.
- Built and maintained automated performance dashboards in Looker Studio and Google Sheets, providing stakeholders with real-time visibility into KPIs, spend pacing, and campaign health.
- Spearheaded A/B testing programs for ad creatives, headlines, and landing page messaging, resulting in measurable improvements in Click-Through Rates (CTR) and Conversion Rates (CVR) across channels.
- Continuously monitored performance trends, conducted competitive research, and implemented data-driven optimizations to enhance account scalability and profitability.

- Managed $400K+ in monthly paid media budgets across Google Ads and Meta Ads, consistently driving $625K in average monthly revenue through full-funnel campaign execution and ROI-focused optimizations.
- Set up and structured new advertising accounts on both Google and Meta platforms, implementing comprehensive conversion tracking using Google Tag Manager (GTM) and the Meta Pixel to ensure accurate attribution and performance measurement.
- Designed and optimized high-converting landing pages using WordPress and Instapage, resulting in a 30% increase in lead generation volume by improving UX, CTA clarity, and mobile responsiveness.
- Launched automated email retention flows, increasing customer lifetime value (LTV) and retention by 17%, while supporting full-funnel growth and client re-engagement initiatives.
- Executed targeted SEO campaigns, growing organic traffic by 10,000 visits per month and contributing to 150+ inbound leads monthly, complementing paid efforts and reducing overall CAC.

- Developed and executed data-driven paid media strategies across Google and Meta platforms, contributing to a 40% increase in sales volume through continuous campaign optimization and audience refinement.
- Automated cross-platform KPI reporting by integrating Google Analytics and Google Sheets, improving visibility into performance metrics while saving approximately 10 hours per week in manual reporting tasks.
- Collaborated on lifecycle marketing initiatives, improving email open rates from 8% to 20% by redesigning subject lines, optimizing send times, and deploying segmented sequences tailored to user behavior and funnel stage.
- Managed real-time budget pacing and bid adjustments, leveraging historical performance trends and predictive analysis to deliver a 30% lift in return on investment (ROI) while maintaining efficiency across paid channels.
- Worked cross-functionally with creative and analytics teams to align campaign messaging, ensure consistent brand voice, and maximize conversion opportunities across the funnel.

headline: President and CEO @ Kiffik Biomedical, Inc.
about:
At Kiffik Biomedical, where we’re pioneering the future of real-time health monitoring and molecular diagnostics. Our patented platform enables the continuous, non-invasive extraction of native Interstitial Fluid (ISF)—a breakthrough that unlocks an entirely new layer of biological insight previously inaccessible outside the hospital.

Our wearable technology empowers clinicians, researchers, and pharmaceutical companies with unprecedented access to the molecular signals driving health and disease—in both humans and animals. The implications span faster drug development, earlier disease detection, and smarter, more personalized care.

With over 30 years in the medical device and life sciences industries, I’ve led both startups and established companies through innovation, growth, and successful commercialization. My background includes leadership roles at Precision Global Medical Solutions and Signati Medical Inc., with expertise in product strategy, market development, regulatory pathways, and global commercialization.

I’m passionate about building visionary teams, unlocking new markets, and delivering technologies that improve lives.

Let’s connect if you’re working at the intersection of diagnostics, digital health, or advanced biomarker discovery.

experience.description: Kiffik Biomedical, Inc. (“Kiffik”) is a biotechnology company that has developed a revolutionary technology based on the continuous extraction of native Interstitial Fluid (ISF) that will transform the medical, life science, and health monitoring industries. ISF is an information-rich biofluid that has been inaccessible for continuous extraction and analysis, until now. Kiffik has developed a wearable, non-invasive technology which provides continuous access to native interstitial fluid in humans and animals. This technology will revolutionize the collection of ISF, will lead to better quality of life for patients, and will facilitate faster therapeutic developments in the medical and life sciences.

experience.companyName: PulseFlow Technologies (The Diabetic Boot Co Ltd)
experience.description:
Gleen what you will from below, I've been around a while, earning my place in an unforgiving industry, staying true to ingrained values of providing healthcare institutions with quality medical devices that actually bring about patient results... whilst at the same time motivating individuals to support this vision. So I would be lying if I said it was easy! 

One of the most compelling parts of this role is being able to watch conceptual ideas evolve from funding through to manufacture and client success. 

The Diabetic Boot Company Limited trading as PulseFlow Technologies is no passing train. Their technology will change the way wounds are assessed and treated. As President, my mantle is to create a vessel that can make a difference and I'm certainly not lying when I tell you I get as excited as a little kid with every stage progressing - from UK bootstrap start up to watching a team of world class surgical experts bring about facilitating the treatment of Diabetic Foot Ulcers. 

PulseFlowDF is wearable tech - effectively a mobile blood pumping device built into a smart sneaker style off-loader that will help to curb the amount of lower limb amputations globally.  

Our success will define the future of limb salvage.
